Comment.val: 27.08.2014 SH SCR19032 Old version of BPH101 called from online test program to compare results of new/new version

Text.val: Author: Peter van der Veen; created: 27.07.2001
27.08.2014 SH SCR19032 Added PI.SKIP_DATABASE_UPDATES (used for testing purposes to test BPH101 without database updates)
14.08.2014 SH SCR19032 Restored backup of BPH101
04.07.2014 SH SCR19007 Added PIO.TMPJ_AMOUNTDESKTOPCURR and PIO.TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDITCURR (incl. updates)
29.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
12.07.2011 SH SCR16611 Drafts: Added update BDPC_AMOUNTPAYCURR
02.05.2011 JOH SCR16385 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY
and GB002 by GB902
07.04.2011 SH SCR16349 Drafts: Changed update of V.REFERENCE
16.02.2011 SH SCR16227 Changed calc to book drafts immed
21.01.2011 SH SCR16058 Drafts: Extended update BDPC_INTERCREDIT
15.12.2010 SH SCR16057 Drafts: Added new BDPC fields for update
10.06.2010 AK SCR15582 canceled the range on BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE(=2 or =4)
30.09.2009 GB SCR14942 Extended condition of step 2
08.09.2009 SH SCR14771 Added PO.PAYMENTINBATCH and removed test 1 "Automatic
transfer of received payments to main account" and test 2 "Automatic booking of
advances (Finsta)"
19.05.2006 SH SCR11290 Step3 Changed calc from SUM(DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDARFT)
to SUM(INVO_AACTUALI) in draft part
09.01.2006 SH SCR10049 Step3 Fixed bug if multiple CHQE rows are selected
20.12.2005 SH SCR9684 Step 3 Extended darft handling with updates of output para
19.12.2005 SH SCR9684 Added V.AUTOMATIC, becomes TRUE if auto. payment
handling is possible, if TRUE then task "Book payment" is performed.
15.12.2005 AK SCR9803 TMPL_VALUEDATE= BADP_PAYMENTVALUEDATE
14.12.2005 SH SCR9779 Fixed bug in step 3 for normal payments
08.12.2005 SH SCR9683 Changed test 3 and added part to handle payment if belongs
to one cheque and moved part to handle payment if belongs to a cheque unit to
the end of program
06.10.2005 SH SCR9175 Added new Test3
19.09.2004 SH SCR6719 Added test that Test 1 has to be performed only if
BADP_BANK_CURRENCY ='EUR' OR 'USD'
06.08.2004 SH SCR6719 1 Auto transfer .... --> Added new test with
BDPD_DESCRIPTIONTYPE=2 and BPDP_DESCRIPTION = 'S-Zentral'
18.12.2003 SH SCR5070 Added TMPL_BOOKINGDATE, init with BADP_DATDAILYSTATEMENT
04.11.2003 SH SCR4673 Added new auto. test 2 Auto. booking of advances (FINSTA)
27.08.2003 JJ SCR4200 changed store create TMPL was storing amountH in C and vv
25.11.2002 SH Storno change according to SCR2440 and update TMPL_LEDGER
- with PI.BADP_LEDG_NO
19.11.2002 JJ SCR2440 cont. changed update PO.LEDGER in RS of "1 Auto..."
11.11.2002 SCR2503 SH Add 2 new parameters PIO.TMPJ_AMOUNTBESKTOP and
- PIO.TMPJ_AMOUNTCREDIT and perform updates to this parameters instead of
- updating the physical TMPJ table. (Porblems with records has been updated)
28.10.2002 SCR2440 SH Add parameters BADP_BANKID, BADP_BANKACCOUNT and
- BADPDATDAILYSTATEMENT and the storing of two TMPL rows if the automatic
- test was successful
18.09.2002 Removed table BADP out of BPH101 and add therefore parameters
- Updates to the BADP row will be made by the calling programs with the output
- values of BPH101 (Problem: "Record has been updated", before the change)
15.08.2002 SCR1939 SH Add 1. Test "Automatic transfer of received payments
- to mainaccount", new requirement and also a new parameter
- PIO.BADT_NAYMENTSHANDLED was added which will be updated in thiis program
17.07.2002 SCR1691 SH Select new field "BADP_DAILYRUNNUMBER" to obatin
- table BADT with primary key
28.05.2002 SH Changed ACCESS for table BANK to read
20.03.2002 SH Build new part which was before in BPH223A in section
- PO.CHQU_ID <> 0 and (PO.CHQU_ID = 0 and PO.LEDGER <> 0)
// reset outgoing parameters
-- Initis
... recalc PI.BADP_AMOUNTACCCURR to admin currency, uses in further steps
-- Test automatic booking for matching desciptions
-- Automatic payment handling
-- Final handling if a cheque was detected
-- Final handling if a cheque unit was detected
-- Final handling if no cheque or cheque unit was detected, but the
the payment can be booked on a ledger account or for drafts
-- Step 1 (on bank level)
-- Step 2 (on bank account level)
-- Check for matching description
-- If BDPD_DESCRIPTION contains BALB_DESCRIPTION then the payment could be
booked automatically
-- Normal payment
-- Cheque units
-- Cheques
-- Drafts
-- Payment in batch
@Payments are booked as intercredit in BPH223B, so the module "Book payment" has
to be skipped in this program
-- If only one CHQU row is selected, then we know the payment is for a
cheque unit which we have sent to the bank
... multiple CHQU rows are selected, auto. payment is not possible because we
don't know to which cheque unit the payment belongs
-- If only one CHQE row is selected, then we know the payment is for a
cheque which we have sent to the bank
... multiple CHQE rows are selected, auto. payment is not possible because we
don't know to which cheque the payment belongs
-- Draft can be booked automatically
@Task is ended if once a draft reference is extracted and found in DRFT
-- Check if extract string is a draft reference

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DRFT, :1/INVO WHERE UPPER(DRFT_REFERENCE) = UPPER(':2') and INVO_NO = DRFT_INVO_NO and DRFT_INVO_NO > 0 and DRFT_DATEMONEYRECEIVED is null FOR FETCH ONLY
select cast(sum (DRFT_AMOUNTCURRDRAFT) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DRFT where upper(DRFT_REFERENCE) = upper(':2') and DRFT_INVO_NO = 0 and DRFT_DATEMONEYRECEIVED is null for fetch only
